name: wirelessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that uses radio signals rather than electrical wires to connect computers, mobile phones, etc. to each other: connect wirelessly Both the keyboard and mouse connect wirelessly to the computer. Some new televisions can communicate wirelessly with a computer.
More examplesFewer examplesNowadays, the data can all be transmitted wirelessly. The headset is wirelessly linked to the mobile phone in your pocket.Some printers can be wirelessly connected to your computer.You will need a card for each computer that you want to use wirelessly.
